name: Piensa Technologies
tag_list: internet, media, social-media, mexico, latin-america, domain-names, saas, spanish, espaol
overview:
Piensa Technologies is a Mexican firm, established in 1994 as an I.T. consulting and technology integration company.

Since then, we specialized in Business Mission Critical applications and solutions all of them Internet based as SaaS products and services; mostly all of them are built or based on open technologies. We have designed and built systems that operate through the web and are used by many local and international firms to fulfill their requirements of data processing on their Supply Chains (i.e. Warehousing, distribution, logistics …)

Currently we have operations in Mexico, the Caribbean and Latin America, nevertheless our customers are from all over the globe.

Piensa as of today has evolved into a multi-industry brand having projects and investing in ventures where our Internet and I.T. expertise is directly applied buildind products, services and Internet properties in sectors such as: e-Commerce, Digital Branding, Social Media, Radio & TV, content creation and management, Aerospace, Bio-technology… and more…

With have several business units in order to attend the growing demands of our customers such as the Software development group, the Internet group, the business management consulting group and the commercial unit.

High Quality standards are our main philosophy with the final objective of establishing long term business relationships with our customers. Cost effectivenes, quality and accountability are key principles to our business.
